items.title: IgorBabkin/ts-ioc-container: Full feature, lightweight, dependency injection container

items.content_html: This is a simple and lightweight web-based video calling application built using modern web technologies. It allows users to initiate real-time video calls directly from their web browsers, enabling seamless communication and collaboration between individuals or groups.
items.title: devesh-y/Video-Calling-Application: This is a simple and lightweight web-based video calling application built using modern web technologies. It allows users to initiate real-time video calls directly from their web browsers, enabling seamless communication and collaboration between individuals or groups.

items.title: scassius/lil-orm: A lightweight sqlite3 ORM

items.content_html: The Backend URL Shortener is a powerful and efficient application designed to handle URL shortening operations. This lightweight backend service allows you to generate shortened URLs programmatically, making it an ideal solution for developers looking to integrate URL shortening capabilities into their applications.
items.title: WissemHammami009/backend-urlshort-app: The Backend URL Shortener is a powerful and efficient application designed to handle URL shortening operations. This lightweight backend service allows you to generate shortened URLs programmatically, making it an ideal solution for developers looking to integrate URL shortening capabilities into their applications.

items.content_html: PondLive is a lightweight, and easy to use serverside only web framework, leveraging the power of PondSocket to create a simple, yet powerful, SPA framework.

items.content_html: Store is a lightweight shared state library by the StencilJS core team. Implements a simple key/value map that efficiently re-renders components when necessary.

items.content_html: PomoJS is a simple pomodoro timer written in JavaScript. It is designed to be as minimal as possible, while still being functional. It's also designed to be as lightweight as possible, so it can be used on any device.
items.title: Ignis621/PomoJS: PomoJS is a simple pomodoro timer written in JavaScript. It is designed to be as minimal as possible, while still being functional. It's also designed to be as lightweight as possible, so it can be used on any device.

items.content_html: Objix is a delightfully convienient, high performance, zero dependency and super lightweight utility which extends the javascript standard library to sugar many common use cases for working with any objects.
items.title: mattaylor/objix: Objix is a delightfully convienient, high performance, zero dependency and super lightweight utility which extends the javascript standard library to sugar many common use cases for working with any objects.
